Package ch.telegraphstudios.HangLeMan.GUI

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Renderable
    A renderable screen item.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HLMButton
    This is just a button with an image.
    HLMFullScreenWindow
    This window is always in full screen mode by simply covering the windows taskbar.
    HLMGame
    This awesome swing component is responsible for the whole game mechanism and also for displaying it.
    HLMPodest  
    HLMSettings
    This panel provides settings to the player.
    HLMToolbar
    This component contains multiple actions and information labels.
    RenderThread
    This is just a thread which repaints the window 60 times per second.
